issue.title: [Rust] Add array_ops method for filtering an array
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4040](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4040). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement a method that can filter an array  based on a provided boolean array and return a new array containing the filtered values.
```java

fn filter(array: &Array, filter: &BooleanArray) -> ArrayRef
```
